EmailTemplate.description: Communities: New Member Welcome Email Final
EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Email Consumer. Final
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to {!Community_Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Help & Support
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Welcome to {!Community_Name}. To get started, please click this link: {!Community_Url}
Thank you,
Australia Post
This email was sent by Australia Post. Australia Post does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference.
